Its head office is in Johannesburg. Fee Details
1. To make a deposit into your Ruturn Trading Account, please select the bank from the above list, which will display the correct EFT details. Then use the above reference number to make a deposit into that account. 

2. Your deposit can take up to 48 hours to clear and show in your Ruturn Trading Wallet. 

3. For users who bank with Capitec or another bank not listed here, please deposit into First National Bank. Add Money Withdraw Money Change Password Privacy Policy FICA SARS (coming soon) Language (coming soon) Report a Problem Submit Details FAQ Terms and Conditions Terms and Conditions Partner
ruturntrader@gmail.com 1. While selling shares the user will not able to withdraw money right away, as money would be tied up for 3 days. However the user would be able to buy other shares.

2. Requests received before 2pm Monday to Friday, will be released from our Mercantile Bank account by 4pm.

3. Requests received after 2pm Monday to Friday, as well as requests received on a weekend/public holidays, your funds will only be released the following business day.  "Your withdrawal request has been received and will be actioned within the next few days" Favourites Enter amount to withdraw (in Rand) Note: If you want to get your FICA documents updated, please attach the documents and Email us.

Someone will be in contact with you to discuss this further. Top 40 Best of Day In order to invite your phone contacts we need permission to access your contact book please allow us access it. In order to upload document & take pictures we need permission to access your storage,camera so please allow us access it. Hi there! We need a few things from you. Throughout your experience with us, we may ask for access to your Contacts, Device Storage, SMS etc. We will only ever ask for access to items that will improve your experience. Next Save and Exit By entering your phone number and ticking the checkboxes above, you agree to all Terms and Conditions of any of the subsidiaries, execution partners and holding companies. Email Verification You have been successfully registered with us Enter new pin Re-enter new pin Enter pin Re-enter pin User Detail To complete the FICA step, we need a copy of your RSA ID book or card (front and back) and Bank Statement. Please complete both processes below. Please select if you are using an ID Book or ID Card. A Card requires a picture of both the front and back.

I have a: Upload Front Back ID Card Please upload a colour scan or detailed photo of the front and back of your RSA ID card.

It should clearly show your details (ID Number, name, date of birth and photo). Complete Please upload a bank statement. It must show your name, address and be dated within the last 3 months. Please upload a color scan or detailed photo of your RSA ID Book.

It should clearly show your details (ID Number, name, date of birth and photo). GREEN ID BOOK Id card Upload Bank Statement Bank Statement Account Holder Bank Name Branch Code Branch Name Account Number Account Type Submit Banking Details Upload Completed Update Incomplete Ruturn Trading suggests investing over R150. However you are able to continue with a smaller investment. Market Closed Ruturn Trading Proceed Confirm Edit FICA - It's your money, so no credit check! If you are trading after hours, your order will be processed the next morning when the market opens. You will be able to view updates in your nest egg screen. Your FICA Document is not yet verified!
